Row.Text: [COLOR_CYAN]* National Wonder (each player may build one)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People generation in this City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a Monument in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.
